item.title: Integrating the CMSIS (DSP) library in STM32CubeIDE
item.description: I couldn’t find an option to download or integrate the ARM CMSIS (Cortex Microcontroller Software Interface Standard) library in STM32CubeIDE with a single mouse click. When working with the STM32F4 family controllers, I like to make use of the DSP functions with the on chip FPU. The informative Youtube channel YetAnotherElectronicsChannel explains how to manually add the CMSIS library into the project. I found a way to make the library selectable from the CubeMX configurator tool built-in the IDE.
